about_the_game:
This is a unofficial fangame of the Touhou Project series. It is permitted under the Touhou Project Derivative Work Guidelines Please support the official releases, some of which are available on Steam!

FEATURES

  • Beautiful artwork, multiple stunning scenes throughout the game!
  • Riveting soundtrack to fully immerse you into the many stunning scenes!
  • Engaging dialogue with references true to the source material!
  • Easy going, casual visual novel gameplay!

STORY

You're going through some really dark times, so much so that you needed some immediate intervention, however, at the last minute, your soul was heard crying for help, and Sakuya Izayoi was sent to intervene, she's more than happy to spend a couple of days with you to cheer you up, so make the most of it, or end up as the mistresses next special meal...

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains dialogue and images  pertaining to mature mental health topics such as suicide.

name: Save Me, Sakuya-san!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: She's here to help! Let Sakuya Izayoi from the Touhou Project comfort you after encountering some hardships in this beautiful visual novel that aims to heal your troubles away!
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese
